issues.description: Documentation instructs to run 'npm install' but no package.json exists in the project, causing setup to fail.
issues.reproduction_result: npm install fails with 'Could not read package.json: ENOENT'.
issues.fix_explanation: Removed npm-based setup steps as they are not applicable; provided direct usage instructions instead.

issues.description: Range specified as 0–10, but code enforces 1–5.
issues.reproduction_result: Calling startService with retryCount=0 throws error 'retryCount must be between 1 and 5'.
issues.fix_explanation: Updated range to 1–5 to match code.

issues.description: Default specified as 1, but code uses 3.
Example uses retryCount: 0, which is invalid per code.
issues.fix_explanation: Updated example to use valid value 3 and added import statement.
